statements: UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET location = 'New York' WHERE service_name = 'VPN'
UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET configuration = '{"network": "public"}' WHERE location = 'Chicago'
UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET configuration = '{"ip_address": "192.168.1.100", "subnet_mask": "255.255.255.0"}', location = 'Data Center A' WHERE service_name = 'Service A';
UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET location = 'Office Building B', configuration = '{"ip_address": "10.0.0.1", "subnet_mask": "255.255.0.0"}' WHERE service_name = 'Service C';
UPDATE network_configurations SET configuration = '{"key":"value"}', service_name = 'Service A' WHERE service_id = 1;
UPDATE locations SET region = 'Asia-Pacific', location_name = 'Tokyo' WHERE location_id = 2;
UPDATE network_configurations SET service_name='UpdateService', configuration='{'key':'value'}', location='NewYork' WHERE service_id=1;
UPDATE locations SET region='Europe', location_name='Paris' WHERE location_id=3;
UPDATE network_configurations SET configuration = '{"key":"value1"}', service_name = 'service1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE services SET description = 'Updated description', service_type = 'type2' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE network_configurations SET configuration = '{"protocol":"UDP","port":5000}' WHERE service_name = 'Service A';
UPDATE services SET description = 'New description for Service B' WHERE service_name = 'Service B';
UPDATE network_configurations SET configuration_data = '{"key1": "value1", "key2": "value2"}' WHERE service_name = 'Service1';
UPDATE service_providers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', contact_person = 'New Contact' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE network_configurations SET configuration_data = '{"threshold": 80}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE service_providers SET contact_person = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE provider_name = 'Example Provider';
UPDATE network_devices SET device_type = 'router' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE network_services SET service_type = 'firewall', configuration_id = 2 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE network_services SET service_type='Updated Type' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE network_configurations SET location='New Location', service_type='New Service Type' WHERE id=2;
